### lowerFormalArguments() {#a74c78051669d5513b0b9616495bfc7a5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool M68kCallLowering::lowerFormalArguments (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt; &gt; VRegs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionloweringinfo">FunctionLoweringInfo</a> &amp; FLI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This hook must be implemented to lower the incoming (formal) arguments, described by <code>VRegs</code>, for GlobalISel.

Each argument must end up in the related virtual registers described by <code>VRegs</code>. In other words, the first argument should end up in <code>VRegs</code>&#91;0&#93;, the second in <code>VRegs</code>&#91;1&#93;, and so on. For each argument, there will be one register for each non-aggregate type, as returned by <code>computeValueLLTs</code>. <code>MIRBuilder</code> is set to the proper insertion for the argument lowering. <code>FLI</code> is required for sret demotion.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
True if the lowering succeeded, false otherwise.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/lib/target/m68k/gisel/m68kcalllowering-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/lib/target/m68k/gisel/m68kcalllowering-h">M68kCallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/lib/target/m68k/gisel/m68kcalllowering-cpp/#l00122">122</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/lib/target/m68k/gisel/m68kcalllowering-cpp">M68kCallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### lowerReturn() {#abfdadd18c92c595797ca5409d708f2ef}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool M68kCallLowering::lowerReturn (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Val, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt; VRegs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionloweringinfo">FunctionLoweringInfo</a> &amp; FLI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> SwiftErrorVReg) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This hook must be implemented to lower outgoing return values, described by <code>Val</code>, into the specified virtual registers <code>VRegs</code>.

This hook is used by GlobalISel.

<code>FLI</code> is required for sret demotion.

<code>SwiftErrorVReg</code> is non-zero if the function has a swifterror parameter that needs to be implicitly returned.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
True if the lowering succeeds, false otherwise.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/lib/target/m68k/gisel/m68kcalllowering-h/#l00034">34</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/lib/target/m68k/gisel/m68kcalllowering-h">M68kCallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/lib/target/m68k/gisel/m68kcalllowering-cpp/#l00093">93</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/lib/target/m68k/gisel/m68kcalllowering-cpp">M68kCallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
